016package io.micronaut.maven.testresources;
017
018import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ServerFactory;
019import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ServerUtils;
020import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
021import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
022import org.apache.maven.toolchain.ToolchainManager;
023
024import java.io.File;
025import java.time.Duration;
026import java.util.ArrayList;
027import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
028import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
029import java.util.stream.Collectors;
030
031import static io.micronaut.maven.MojoUtils.findJavaExecutable;
032
033/**
034 * Default implementation for {@link ServerFactory}.
035 *
036 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
037 * @since 4.0.0
038 */
039public class DefaultServerFactory implements ServerFactory {
040
041    private final Log log;
042    private final ToolchainManager toolchainManager;
043    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
044    private final AtomicBoolean serverStarted;
045    private final String testResourcesVersion;
046    private final boolean debugServer;
047
048    private Process process;
049
050    public DefaultServerFactory(Log log,
051                                ToolchainManager toolchainManager,
052                                MavenSession mavenSession,
053                                AtomicBoolean serverStarted,
054                                String testResourcesVersion,
055                                boolean debugServer) {
056        this.log = log;
057        this.toolchainManager = toolchainManager;
058        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
059        this.serverStarted = serverStarted;
060        this.testResourcesVersion = testResourcesVersion;
061        this.debugServer = debugServer;
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public void startServer(ServerUtils.ProcessParameters processParameters) {
066        log.info("Starting Micronaut Test Resources service, version " + testResourcesVersion);
067        var cli = new ArrayList<String>();
068
069        String javaBin = findJavaExecutable(toolchainManager, mavenSession);
070        if (javaBin == null) {
071            throw new IllegalStateException("Java executable not found");
072        }
073        cli.add(javaBin);
074        cli.addAll(processParameters.getJvmArguments());
075        if (debugServer) {
076            cli.add("-agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=*:8000");
077        }
078        processParameters.getSystemProperties().forEach((key, value) -> cli.add("-D" + key + "=" + value));
079        cli.add("-cp");
080        cli.add(processParameters.getClasspath().stream()
081            .map(File::getAbsolutePath)
082            .collect(Collectors.joining(File.pathSeparator)));
083        String mainClass = processParameters.getMainClass();
084        if (mainClass == null) {
085            throw new IllegalStateException("Main class is not set");
086        }
087        cli.add(mainClass);
088        cli.addAll(processParameters.getArguments());
089
090        if (log.isDebugEnabled()) {
091            log.debug(String.format("Command parameters: %s", String.join(" ", cli)));
092        }
093
094        var builder = new ProcessBuilder(cli);
095        try {
096            process = builder.inheritIO().start();
097        } catch (Exception e) {
098            log.error("Failed to start server", e);
099            serverStarted.set(false);
100            if (process != null) {
101                process.destroyForcibly();
102            }
103        } finally {
104            if (process != null) {
105                if (process.isAlive()) {
106                    serverStarted.set(true);
107                } else {
108                    process.destroyForcibly();
109                }
110            }
111        }
112    }
113
114    @Override
115    public void waitFor(Duration duration) throws InterruptedException {
116        if (process != null) {
117            process.waitFor(duration.toMillis(), TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
118        }
119    }
120}
